long_description: Satisfy your hunger with a handful of the tasty KIND Healthy Grains Cluster mix. Cinnamon Oat flavor combines cinnamon, flax seeds, amaranth, quinoa, oats, millet and buckwheat for a delicious snack; 720mg of omega-3 fatty acids and 16g of whole grains. Vanilla Blueberry flavor blends blueberries, flax seeds, amaranth, quinoa, oats, millet, buckwheat and a hint of vanilla; includes 750mg of omega-3 fatty acids and 5g of fiber. Oats & Honey flavor blends flakes of toasted coconut, a touch of honey and the whole grains amaranth, quinoa, oats, millet and buckwheat; provides 17g of whole grains. KIND Healthy Grains Cluster mixes are all natural, gluten free and cholesterol free; contain no refined sugar, genetically modified organisms or trans fats. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Satisfy your hunger with a handful of the tasty KIND Healthy Grains Cluster mix.
